code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useContextCart}from"../contexts/CartContext";import"../styles/pages/CartPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartPage=()=>{const{cartItems,updateCartItem,removeFromCart}=useContextCart();const[updated,setUpdated]=useState({});const handleUpdate=item=>{setUpdated(prev=>({...prev,[item.id]:true}));};const handleRemove=id=>{removeFromCart(id);setUpdated(prev=>({...prev,[id]:false}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-items",children:cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`images/${item.image}`,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"quantity-btn",onClick:()=>updateCartItem(item.id,"-"),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:item.quantity,className:"quantity-input",readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"quantity-btn",onClick:()=>updateCartItem(item.id,"+"),children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"remove-btn",onClick:()=>handleRemove(item.id),children:"Remove"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:updated[item.id]?"updated-btn":"update-cart-btn",onClick:()=>handleUpdate(item),children:updated[item.id]?"Item Updated":"Update Cart"})]})]})]},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-total",children:["Total: $",cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price*item.quantity,0).toFixed(2)]})]});};export default CartPage;
